item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2015-12-04/#comment-254">Patricia Erlandson</a>.
Thanks Patricia.
I'm working on a better solution for submissions and 'discovery', but in the meantime if there's anything you think I've missed or deserves a shout out, please feel free to leave a comment or drop me a note via the contact link on this site.
Cheers!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Patricia Erlandson.

Thanks Patricia.

I’m working on a better solution for submissions and ‘discovery’, but in the meantime if there’s anything you think I’ve missed or deserves a shout out, please feel free to leave a comment or drop me a note via the contact link on this site.

Cheers!

item.title: By: Patricia Erlandson
item.dc:creator: Patricia Erlandson
item.description: I like to read about everything you share every week. But maybe you could share somethings from Sweden as well. :)
item.content:encoded: I like to read about everything you share every week. But maybe you could share somethings from Sweden as well. ðŸ™‚
